data.message: Sorry, this is not about the pretty, pretty picture - there is just no other way to post a new 'separate' comment/mesasge on facebook's primary page, very sorry.  For users to NOT be able to modify their security question, well, THAT IS NOT ACCEPTABLE!!!!  We should be able to modify our security questions over time. This is the only site I've ever encountered that stated we cannot modify it. I work in Information / Cyber Security and for facebook to tell people that is COMPLETELY BEYOND BELIEF and it boggles the mind, especially as was noted by many people when you forget your security question, it is bad. But, when FACEBOOK WANTS YOU TO UPLOAD A DRIVERS LICENSE or other government id as a secondary id.  THERE IS NO FRIGGIN' WAY people should have to upload yet more personal info (even if it is in a SECURE location at facebook). This is just beyond the pale. I say this for all the others who have been disappointed by facebook on this issue and those who will be...
